metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3765 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: decoder/impeg2d_bitstream.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-07-01 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted application, aka internal bug 28168413.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
